frontmatter.title: [WIP] Automating the Building and Deployment of Full-Stack Side Projects for Dummies
frontmatter.description: I'll attempt to figure out an easy way to automate building and deploying frontend and backend artifacts for my side projects without. I'll try to avoid making too many assumptions about knowledge of various different technical aspects to hopefully make this guide useful for those new to full-stack software development.  Maybe solving this personal pain point of mine and creating a cloneable template I can use to kickstart new projects will motivate me to push more frequently.
